The bullied kid should probably just kill himself at this point. His mother is not only rewarding the guys for beating him up, but she's also enjoying every second of it. @Anon Since 1994 Yeah, I kind of agree, not all ntr are like this, some have half decent plot worth reading at times but this one is meh. Pretty basic one, guy getting cucked by his dad who supposedly has a 10 inch schlong, not really anything original. I guess it's safe to say that when it comes to plot, ntr doujins on a whole suck, but not all, I've read some great ones here. But come on, we know why you're here, know the drill, drill it and be done, move on nothing to see here. Hentai should be a means of escape when it comes to mortal lust, express it, revel in it for the time being, then move on, life isn't about squirting liquids with no other purpose than the dopamine hit. You want the plot, go read something worth reading, not this crap where you're halfway confused about your boner, mind trying to figure out the next series of protocol, jerk off or read for fun? Don't play yourself into the wicked dilemma, do what has to be done and forget it. Sorry to make you read this shit
